src:
Reug - Reug attaque ses adversaires : « Dagn Ma Ragal, Lamb dji dafa beuri tapettes... »
06 Nov 2019 by Dakaractu




Amadou Kane alias "Reug Reug" n'a pas sa langue dans sa poche. Pour preuve, le lutteur de l'écurie Thiaroye sur mer n'a pas manqué de taxer ses potentiels adversaires de poltrons. Selon lui, il existerait trop de "Tapettes" dans le milieu de la lutte. Allant plus loin, Amadou Kane, sûr de sa force, estime que c'est précisément lui que craignent ses congénères lutteurs. Enfin, il explique par cet état de fait, les innombrables saisons blanches que traversent bon nombre de licenciés...
text:
Reug - Reug attacks his opponents: "Dagn My Ragal, Lamb dji dafa beuri ..."
06 Nov 2019 by Dakaractu




Amadou Kane aka "Reug Reug" does not have his tongue in his pocket. As proof, the wrestler of the team Thiaroye on sea did not fail to tax his potential opponents of cowards. According to him, there would be too many "Tapettes" in the middle of the fight. Going further, Amadou Kane, sure of his strength, believes that it is precisely him that his fellow fighters fear. Finally, it explains by this state of fact, the innumerable white seasons that cross many licensees ...
